name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 033
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Your TV Is Being Racist. While we've all had to endure racist nonsense spouted through our TV sets for years, Fox News' recent obsession of using critical race theory as a justification for voter suppression has been more than I can handle. I need a hat, "Make TV Anti-Racist Again." (Though I guess it never really was anti-racist to begin with)
